data.eml:eml: A new genus of Coelotinae (Araneae, Agelenidae) from southern China

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Chen, Lu, Li, Shuqiang, Zhao, Zhe (2015): A new genus of Coelotinae (Araneae, Agelenidae) from southern China. ZooKeys 541: 41-56, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.541.6678, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.541.6678
